title: Qureshi condoles over demise of ex-JI chief Syed Munawar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 26 (APP):Minister for Foreign Affairs Makhdoom Shah Mahmood Qureshi Friday expressed deep grief over the demise of former Amir of Jamat-e-Islami Syed Munawar Hassan.
According to a foreign ministry press release, the minister recalled late Syed Munawar as a gentle and compassionate human being.
He prayed for peace of the departed soul and courage to the bereaved family to bear the loss with equanimity.
